description.original: Allows you to create columns in Obsidian Markdown
description.translation: Allows you to create columns in Obsidian Markdown

dict.desc:\"Columns will have this minimum wi: desc:"Columns will have this minimum width before wrapping to a new row. 0 disables column wrapping. Useful for smaller devices"
dict.name:\"The default span of an item\": name:"The default span of an item"
dict.desc:\"The default width of a column. If: desc:"The default width of a column. If the minimum width is specified, the width of the column will be multiplied by this setting."
